definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: The croupier wished him luck and spun the wheel.
sentences.chinese: 收赌注的人祝他好运，然后将轮盘转动起来。

sentences.english: The flywheel is a relatively heavy metal wheel, which is firmly attached to the crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 飞轮是一个相当重的金属轮盘，飞轮与曲轴紧相连。

sentences.english: After doing that, the new generation was selected by synthesizing roulette wheel and optimization selecting.
sentences.chinese: 再结合旋转轮盘赌和最优化选择新一代染色体。

sentences.english: I played a crazy game of Russian roulette with my life.
sentences.chinese: 我用我的生活玩了一场疯狂的俄罗斯轮盘赌游戏。

sentences.english: Optimizing Choice of Product Innovation Item Based on Genetic Evolution;
sentences.chinese: 再结合旋转轮盘赌和最优化选择新一代染色体。

sentences.english: For example, I am playing roulette.
Investors felt they were playing Russian roulette.
sentences.chinese: 投资者感觉他们是在玩俄罗斯轮盘赌。

sentences.english: He was totally cleaned out after a night at the roulette table.
sentences.chinese: 在一夜的轮盘赌桌上，他输光了所有的钱。

sentences.english: Everybody is quiet when the croupier throws the ball.
sentences.chinese: 当那个球在轮盘赌上转动时每个人都安静了下来。

sentences.english: Exploring the Microsoft site is like spinning a roulette wheel.
sentences.chinese: 浏览微软的网站就像玩一个旋转的轮盘赌。

sentences.english: Cool Colors - ranging from violet to green-yellow on the color wheel.
sentences.chinese: 颜色轮盘中从紫罗兰色到黄绿色范围。

sentences.english: Farmer in particular was obsessed with the roulette wheel.
sentences.chinese: 法默对轮盘赌的轮盘特别着迷。

sentences.english: Farmer in particular was obsessed with the roulette wheel.
sentences.chinese: 法默对轮盘赌的轮盘特别着迷。

sentences.english: Henry pushed the starting-wheel while Clara put the petrol in.
sentences.chinese: 克拉拉添加汽油，亨利则手推启动轮盘。

sentences.english: Haldane describes this as resorting to the roulette wheel.
sentences.chinese: 霍尔丹将这一举动形容为进行轮盘赌博。

sentences.english: You've got your Mexican standoff, your Russian roulette, your Chinese water torture.
sentences.chinese: 你已听过俄罗斯轮盘与中国水牢酷刑。

definition: rotating disk/wheel/rotor/cycle of reincarnation in Buddhism
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
the Eternal Wheel of life in Buddhism
